entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Detah
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:22 AM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 32. Wind chill near minus 47. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 39. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening then clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 34.
